title: Puppet Nation ZA's Peter de Villiers reacting to their Emmy nomination will make you LOL
text:
Puppet Nation ZA's Peter de Villiers reacting to their Emmy nomination will make you LOL

19 October, 02:52 PM

Puppet Nation ZA has been nominated for an Emmy award. To celebrate, we took some time to talk rugby with the Peter de Villiers puppet. Watch.

Jennifer Sanasie asks the De Villiers puppet about what he thinks of the Rugby World Cup so far, find out what he hasn't quite recovered from yet.

We also asked him what his reaction was when he found out the whole of puppet nation was nominated for an Emmy award, watch the priceless reaction in the video above.

Follow all our latest videos by subscribing to our YouTube channel here and our Instagram feed here
